pullrequest.title: Fix model snap tool highlighting -> gazebo5

content.raw:
It's fixed by removing the code to [detach the snap visuals](#!/osrf/gazebo/pull-requests/2293/fix-model-snap-tool-highlighting-gazebo5/diff#Lgazebo/gui/ModelSnap.ccF119) in `Reset`. This will be done later in the `Update` function in the render loop. 

I updated the ModelSnap teardown mainly to get the test working otherwise it segfaults at the end before exiting.
content.html:
It's fixed by removing the code to detach the snap visuals in Reset. This will be done later in the Update function in the render loop.

I updated the ModelSnap teardown mainly to get the test working otherwise it segfaults at the end before exiting.
